title: Please Identify this font. TIA
content:
Please Identify this font. Been searching for hours now. :( I am about to trace this then I stumbled into this site. Hope you guys can help me. TIA.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160738/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_137.jpg) | 244.59 KB |
author: prolinker

comments.content:
The best place to find the name of a font is  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160738/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
or click on the "Font ID" link at the top of the page.
